image.png As discussed on the 2022-02-17 Patient Empowerment (PE) Workgroup call we are proposing the following block vote 1 as a part of STU1 ballot reconciliation for the Re-Assessment Timepoints IG to be voted on at next week’s PE meeting (Thursday, 2022-02-24).

Attached is a PowerPoint Summary and Word Document with the 11 block vote issues and their resolutions. You may withdraw any item from the block vote by responding to this email with the specific Key for the item you wish to withdraw or do so on the PE WG call prior to the vote.

Jira search string: project = FHIR AND Specification = "US PACIO Advance Directive Interoperability (FHIR) [FHIR-us-pacio-adi]" AND Grouping =Block-Vote-1 ORDER BY priority DESC, updated DESC

ID Summary Proposed Disposition Reporter
FHIR-34517 Required binding of Type of Clause value set Persuasive – Change binding to extensible Craig Newman
FHIR-34707 ValueSet Personal and Legal Relationship Role Type includes too many values Persuasive with Mod – Remove relationship VS binding. Remove VSs. Remove relationship slice. Michael Brodsky
FHIR-34820 Do Not Require Support For Encounter Persuasive – Remove Must Support of Composition.encounter Michael Brodsky
FHIR-34831 Too early for SHOULD in section 5.2.2 Not Persuasive – SHOULD is intended Kimberly Herman
FHIR-34834 healthcare_agent_appointment -> remove appointment Persuasive – remove ”_appointment” from slice name Kimberly Herman
FHIR-35079 Capability Statement references missing PADI-PMOLSTObservation profile Persuasive with Mod – Change CapabilityStatement value to new name in Dan Vreeman
FHIR-35570 Defining URL should be anchored in THO not hl7.org/fhir. Only those with required binding to a 'code' data type should be anchored in hl7.fhir.org.10 - PADIParticipantRelationshipVS Not Persuasive with Mod – ValueSet being removed per FHIR-34707 Joan Harper
FHIR-35571 Defining URL should be anchored in THO not hl7.org/fhir. Only those with required binding to a 'code' data type should be anchored in hl7.fhir.org.11 - PersonalAndLegalRelationshipRoleTypeVS Not Persuasive with Mod – ValueSet being removed per FHIR-34707 Joan Harper
FHIR-35572 Defining URL should be anchored in THO not hl7.org/fhir. Only those with required binding to a 'code' data type should be anchored in hl7.fhir.org.12 - PresenceIndicatorVS Not Persuasive with Mod – Orphaned ValueSet to be removed Joan Harper
FHIR-35680 Provide additional details to clarify the definition of the Composition.attester:notary_attester data element Persuasive – Accept change as requested Matt Elrod
FHIR-35765 Change unauthenticated request error requirement in CapabilityStatement Persuasive – Update unauthorized error to match latest US Core Corey Spears
